abstract: The Gmail attacks Google disclosed used a rapidly proliferating form of e-mail fraud called spear phishing to steal passwords and monitor accounts.
snippet: The Gmail attacks Google disclosed used a rapidly proliferating form of e-mail fraud called spear phishing to steal passwords and monitor accounts.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Most people know to ignore the e-mail overture from a Nigerian prince offering riches in exchange for a bank account number. That is a scam, plain to the eye.

headline.main: E-Mail Fraud Hides Behind Friendly Face
headline.print_headline: E-Mail Fraud Hides Behind Friendly Face

byline.original: By Matt Richtel and Verne G. Kopytoff
